Many thanks to the uploader,excellent torrent.I have a rooted G1 running Eclair 2.1 and this program runs perfectly on it.To get the maps I wanted I just followed the instructions to download them.All you need to do is connect your phone to your wifi,select which maps you want and leave it to download them.To get the complete UK & Ireland map to less than 10 mins so if you're unsure how to ad maps manually to your sd card,don't bother,just download them.

It works!!!  Perfectly too.  Not sure what went wrong for everyone else but this is what I did.

Firstly I'm using an HTC Legend running 2.1

I installed copilot on to my memory card as the instructions say and opened it using File Manager (from the Market).  It installed fine.

I opened the program by selecting it from the menu and during the set-up it asked all the usual questions (country, which voice to use etc) and it all went well.  At the end it said there weren't any maps installed and to choose which ones I wanted, I chose UK and Ireland.  I chose the option to download to my phone but as the file was 180mb I used wifi.

It took about 5 minutes and the maps set up perfectly.  I then set up a location and the navigation worked perfectly.

Sorry for the long-winded reply but I'm hoping it might help someone else who had trouble with it.

Just uploaded it to my rooted HTC Aria running Android 2.1. Works flawlessly!
